The Departments of Computer Science and Mathematics & Statistics at American University invite applications for a full-time, tenure-track assistant professor position, joint between the two departments, with a focus in data science or artificial intelligence beginning August 1, 2026. We encourage candidates in data science, artificial intelligence, computer science, statistics, mathematics, or related fields with a vibrant research and teaching profile to apply. Applicants should have a PhD or an anticipated PhD completion.
